question: The Golden Jubilee of International Film Festival of India, IFFI is to be organized in which city?
explanation:
The Golden Jubilee of International Film Festival of India, IFFI starts on 20th November in Goa. IFFI- Indiaâ€™s First International Film Festival began its journey from Mumbai in 1952. The festival travelled to Madras, Delhi and Calcutta in the next few years.
The Competition Category was introduced in the 3rd edition in 1965. Sri Lankan film Gamperaliya was the first recipient of the Golden Peacock Award. French actor Isabella Huppert will be honoured with Lifetime Achievement Award at this edition in Goa.
